channel.title: E&P on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in E&P on FinanClub

item.title: EQT
item.description: score:-93 Chances: The 2024 outlook for E&Ps largely surprises to the upside with conservative budgets and steady volumes. Energy stocks – particularly those focused on natural gas – look particularly interesting at the moment. Energy executives are betting on a coming wave of new liquefied natural gas (LNG) plants to lift demand and prices for the fuel.
